paper.title: On the Computation of Discrete Logarithms in Class Groups
paper.abstract: In [3] and [1] a new key exchange system was introduced whose security is related to the difficulty of solving the discrete logarithm problem in the class group of imaginary quadratic orders. Subsequently, in [5] and [4] a subexponential algorithm for computing those class groups was presented and it was shown how to use this algorithm and the index-calculus method to calculate discrete logarithms.
